alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:41PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Nye, west central White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 630 PM PDT... At 541 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles south of Pinto Summit to 33 miles west of Duckwater. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Pinto Summit, Little Fish Lake Valley and Pancake Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
